name: Tanks For Coming
description:
Controls:

Red:                                                                 

Move: WASD

Shoot: Space

Boost: B

Blue:

Move: Arrow keys

Shoot: Numpad 0 (Also none numpad setting in options)

Boost: Numpad 1 (Also none numpad setting in options)

Try out this 2 player tactical tank game with a friend. I may be biased but I personally think the game is pretty cool.

Music: https://www.ashamaluevmusic.com/ and https://www.purple-planet.com/

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-7-font.html#character-map
